TITLE: Formative Feedback
DEF: Providing learners with performance feedback that does not contribute to grading
TASK: The Formative Feedback pattern underpins the ongoing process of providing students with feedback on their learning progression. The central purpose of this pattern is to pinpoint areas for improvement and bolster the students' learning journey. It addresses the issue of infrequent or ineffective feedback and emphasizes the importance of timely and constructive feedback for boosting student learning.
